title: Donald's fire survival plan. - Rev. ed.
brief_description: Donald Duck and his nephews outline the techniques of surviving a fire in the home. Stresses the need for prevention with smoke detectors and collapsible ladders, and presents the lifesaving, “stop, drop and roll” technique.
